title: Vengeful Spirit

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you die, you will be able to deal 2 unstoppable attacks the next night.
- If you are dead, the game can not end until you do your attack from the grave.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose you, or have nobody remain if you are dead.

desc:
Post 481
*"If I don't live, NOBODY lives."*
